items: Company Annual Account and Ellipro Survey
comments: Address matches with the utility bill issued by London City Utilities.
Data for years 2020, 2021, and 2022 are available with Ellipro scores.
Bank account and postal details are verified and match registration data.
No directorship details provided in the annual report.
Annual report lacks specific tax documentation details.
Annual report does not provide details on regulatory compliance.
Business scope verified through achievements and operational details in the annual report.
No data found for PEP screening.
Revenue details provided: record revenue for 2023 of 158.1 billion dollars.
Market capitalization recorded: 489,320 million dollars as of Dec 31, 2023.
